text: The Department of Civil Aviation (DCA; ) is an agency of the Ministry of Communications and Works (Cyprus). Its head office is in Nicosia."Επικοινωνία." Department of Civil Aviation. Retrieved on 7 September 2018. "ΜΗΜΑ ΠΟΛΙΤΙΚΗΣ ΑΕΡΟΠΟΡΙΑΣ Οδός Πινδάρου 27 Τ.Κ. 1429, Λευκωσία, Κύπρος " The agency was established in 1955."History." Department of Civil Aviation. title: Department of Civil Aviation (Cyprus)
